means: 像…，类似于( resemble的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I have never seen anything remotely resembling the horrors of that day.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从没见过一点儿类似于那天的恐怖景象.

sentence.Network_en: The young are permanently in a state of resembling intoxication.
sentence.Network_cn: 年轻人永远处在一种陶醉的状态中。

sentence.Network_en: The science of systems which function in a manner resembling living systems.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究模仿生命系统功能的系统的科学.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pertaining to or resembling of having stigmata ., 与烙印有关的 , 或象有烙印的.
Of , relating to , or resembling the leaf of a plant ., 叶的植物的叶子具有的或有关 , 似植物叶子的.
bred of large heavy - coated white dogs resembling the Newfoundland ., 非常大的多毛白色狗 , 与纽芬兰犬形似.

list.abs: 用原型理论和家族相似性 (family resemblance) 理论对自然语义进行分解和表述 ; 国内也有一些论著和文章谈到原型理论 , necessary.
accidental relations 偶然关系accidental resemblance 偶同accidental sameness 偶然的同一
coefficient of variation 变异系数coefficient resemblance 类似系数coefficient variation 系数变量
similar to or resembling a leaf ., 与叶相似的或象叶子的.

entry.def: If one thing or person resembles another, they are similar to each other.

example.ex: Some of the commercially produced venison resembles beef in flavour...
example.tran: 有些商业化养殖的鹿肉味道和牛肉很相似。

auth_sentence.content: The results are grainy, resembling a pointillist painting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The results are grainy, resembling a pointillist painting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The results are grainy, resembling a pointillist painting.

auth_sentence.content: Red gashes resembling flesh have been torn across it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Red gashes resembling flesh have been torn across it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Red gashes resembling flesh have been torn across it.

auth_sentence.content: It came in a plastic-foam container resembling a cooler.
auth_sentence.res_content: It came in a plastic-foam container resembling a cooler.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It came in a plastic-foam container resembling a cooler.
